actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the military departments from using dogs in connection with any research or other activities relating to biological or chemical warfare agents.

summary.text: Prohibits the military departments from using dogs in connection with any research, development, test, or evaluation relating to biological or chemical warfare agents.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the military departments from using dogs in connection with any research or other activities relating to biological or chemical warfare agents.
